about_the_game:
On Kdimension, you are a tireless seeker of knowledge. As a seeker, your mission is expand your mind and extend your limits by exploit 3D´s world.

Explore a new dimension.

Find amazing places to think. In our worlds you will find places where knowledge and nature will inspire you.

Innovate.

Create concepts, join them and generate 3D's diagrams with the possibilities that Kdimension offers you.

Transfer your thoughts.

Create neural networks of knowledge. Your mind and your ideas represented in 3D. Invite other people to navigate trought your mind.

Have fun thinking.

Use the power of 3D's think while enjoying beautiful animations and amazinf physics in a designed's environment to creativity and the evolution of thought.

On Kdimension, you are a tireless seeker of knowledge. As a seeker, your mission is expand your mind and extend your limits by exploit 3D´s world.

Explore a new dimension.

Find amazing places to think. In our worlds you will find places where knowledge and nature will inspire you.

Innovate.

Create concepts, join them and generate 3D's diagrams with the possibilities that Kdimension offers you.

Transfer your thoughts.

Create neural networks of knowledge. Your mind and your ideas represented in 3D. Invite other people to navigate trought your mind.

Have fun thinking.

Use the power of 3D's think while enjoying beautiful animations and amazinf physics in a designed's environment to creativity and the evolution of thought.
name: Kdimension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 // AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960// AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2 and SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7600K // AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 // AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2 and SteamVR

short_description: Boost your abilities, expand your possibilities, and explore in the new dimension of knowledge. Welcome to Kdimension.
